20504784Di2015UniqueSeparator// No quotes around placeholder and only ONE query that does NOT select on the password.Di2015NewLine// If the query selects on the password then it means that the password is eitherDi2015NewLine// stored as plaitext (which is not good) or the database value can be computed withoutDi2015NewLine// per-user information (which is also not good).Di2015NewLinestring command = "SELECT email, password FROM uc_users WHERE email = @email";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Only look based on the user (the email column should have a Unique constraint)Di2015NewLine// as (although a unique salt makes it very unlikely) passwords are not uniqueDi2015NewLine// nor do they identify users.Di2015NewLineemail.Parameters.AddWithValue("@email", txtEmail.Text);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Then read the password for the given userDi2015NewLinedr = email.ExecuteReader();Di2015NewLineif (!dr.Read()) {Di2015NewLine  // User not found - just stop.Di2015NewLine  return false;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinestring dbPassword = dr.GetString(1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinereturn IsPasswordMatch(dbPassword, txtPassword.Text);Di2015NewLine

20505726Di2015UniqueSeparatorDECLARE @CurrentWeekday AS INTDi2015NewLineDECLARE @LastSunday AS DATETIMEDi2015NewLineDECLARE @LastMonday AS DATETIMEDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineSET @CurrentWeekday = DATEPART(WEEKDAY, GETDATE())Di2015NewLine// Count backwards from today to get to the most recent Sunday.Di2015NewLine// (@CurrentWeekday % 7) - 1 will give the number of days since Sunday; Di2015NewLine// -1 negates for subtraction.Di2015NewLineSET @LastSunday = DATEADD(DAY, -1 * (( @CurrentWeekday % 7) - 1), GETDATE())Di2015NewLine// Monday is obviously one day after last Sunday.Di2015NewLineSET @LastMonday = DATEADD(DAY, 1, @LastSunday)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineSELECT COUNT(od.id) [new_job_posting_this_week] Di2015NewLineFROM rs_job_posting odDi2015NewLineWHERE od.date_created >= @LastMondayDi2015NewLine

20523572Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void button1_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    while (pictureBox1.Top >= 20)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        pictureBox1.Top = pictureBox1.Top - 1;Di2015NewLine        this.Invalidate();Di2015NewLine        this.Refresh();Di2015NewLine        System.Threading.Thread.Sleep(20);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Here you KNOW that the picture box is at y-position 20, so there's not needDi2015NewLine    // for the IFDi2015NewLine    pictureBox1.Visible = false;Di2015NewLine    pictureBox2.Visible = true;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
20523572Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void button1_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{    Di2015NewLine    // Create a threaded timerDi2015NewLine    System.Timers.Timer animationTimer = new System.Timers.Timer();Di2015NewLine    animationTimer.Interval = 20;Di2015NewLine    animationTimer.AutoReset = false; // Only one Ping! We'll activate it if necessaryDi2015NewLine    animationTimer.Elapsed += new ElapsedEventHandler(AnimationStep);Di2015NewLine    animationTimer.Start();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Disable the button also, because we don't want another timer instance toDi2015NewLine    // interfere with our running animationDi2015NewLine    button1.Enabled = false;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
20523572Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void AnimationStep(object source, ElapsedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // The following code needs to be executed in the context of the UI thread.Di2015NewLine    // We need to use this.Invoke in Forms or this.Dispatcher.Invoke in WPFDi2015NewLine    this.Invoke((Action)delegate()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Move picture. Note that we don't need to update the display hereDi2015NewLine        // because the UI thread gets time to do its work while the timer waitsDi2015NewLine        // to fire belowDi2015NewLine        if (pictureBox1.Top > 20)Di2015NewLine            pictureBox1.Top--;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Show other picture maybe. I use <= here because initially, theDi2015NewLine        // position of the picture box may already smaller than 20.Di2015NewLine        if (pictureBox1.Top <= 20)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            pictureBox1.Visible = false;Di2015NewLine            pictureBox2.Visible = true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Or let the timer fire again if we still need to animateDi2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            (source as System.Timers.Timer).Start();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20525847Di2015UniqueSeparator[CommandMethod("MathIsCool")]Di2015NewLinepublic void Draw_Method()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Database db = HostApplicationServices.WorkingDatabase;Di2015NewLine    Editor ed = AcadApplication.DocumentManager.MdiActiveDocument.Editor;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Parameters (get from user prompt if desired)Di2015NewLine    var startP = new Point3d(0, 0, 0);Di2015NewLine    var r = 5.64;Di2015NewLine    var lineGap = 0.4;Di2015NewLine    var chordLen = r * 0.40;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        using (Transaction acTrans = db.TransactionManager.StartOpenCloseTransaction())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var bt = (BlockTable)acTrans.GetObject(db.BlockTableId, OpenMode.ForWrite);Di2015NewLine            var btr = (BlockTableRecord)acTrans.GetObject(bt[BlockTableRecord.ModelSpace], OpenMode.ForWrite);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Create the circleDi2015NewLine            var circ = new Circle(startP, Vector3d.ZAxis, r);Di2015NewLine            btr.AppendEntity(circ);Di2015NewLine            acTrans.AddNewlyCreatedDBObject(circ, true);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Create the horizontal lineDi2015NewLine            var hPt1 = new Point3d(startP.X - (chordLen / 2), startP.Y + (r + lineGap), 0);Di2015NewLine            var hPt2 = new Point3d(hPt1.X + chordLen, hPt1.Y, 0);Di2015NewLine            var hLine = new Line(hPt1, hPt2);Di2015NewLine            btr.AppendEntity(hLine);Di2015NewLine            acTrans.AddNewlyCreatedDBObject(hLine, true);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Create the vertical lineDi2015NewLine            // Arc sagitta = Sqrt(r*r-l*l);Di2015NewLine            var sag = Math.Sqrt(r * r - (chordLen / 2) * (chordLen / 2));Di2015NewLine            var vPt2 = new Point3d(hPt1.X, startP.Y + sag, 0);Di2015NewLine            var vLine = new Line(hPt1, vPt2);Di2015NewLine            btr.AppendEntity(vLine);Di2015NewLine            acTrans.AddNewlyCreatedDBObject(vLine, true);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            acTrans.Commit();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catch (System.Exception ex)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Debug.WriteLine(ex.ToString());Di2015NewLine        ed.WriteMessage(ex.ToString());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20530130Di2015UniqueSeparatorPartitioning.GetAllPartitions(new[] { 1, 2, 3, 4 })Di2015NewLine
20530130Di2015UniqueSeparator{ {1, 2, 3, 4} },Di2015NewLine{ {1, 3, 4}, {2} },Di2015NewLine{ {1, 2, 4}, {3} },Di2015NewLine{ {1, 4}, {2, 3} },Di2015NewLine{ {1, 4}, {2}, {3} },Di2015NewLine{ {1, 2, 3}, {4} },Di2015NewLine{ {1, 3}, {2, 4} },Di2015NewLine{ {1, 3}, {2}, {4} },Di2015NewLine{ {1, 2}, {3, 4} },Di2015NewLine{ {1, 2}, {3}, {4} },Di2015NewLine{ {1}, {2, 3, 4} },Di2015NewLine{ {1}, {2, 4}, {3} },Di2015NewLine{ {1}, {2, 3}, {4} },Di2015NewLine{ {1}, {2}, {3, 4} },Di2015NewLine{ {1}, {2}, {3}, {4} }.Di2015NewLine
20530130Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace PartitionTest {Di2015NewLine    public static class Partitioning {Di2015NewLine        public static IEnumerable<T[][]> GetAllPartitions<T>(T[] elements) {Di2015NewLine            return GetAllPartitions(new T[][]{}, elements);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static IEnumerable<T[][]> GetAllPartitions<T>(Di2015NewLine            T[][] fixedParts, T[] suffixElements)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // A trivial partition consists of the fixed partsDi2015NewLine            // followed by all suffix elements as one blockDi2015NewLine            yield return fixedParts.Concat(new[] { suffixElements }).ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Get all two-group-partitions of the suffix elementsDi2015NewLine            // and sub-divide them recursivelyDi2015NewLine            var suffixPartitions = GetTuplePartitions(suffixElements);Di2015NewLine            foreach (Tuple<T[], T[]> suffixPartition in suffixPartitions) {Di2015NewLine                var subPartitions = GetAllPartitions(Di2015NewLine                    fixedParts.Concat(new[] { suffixPartition.Item1 }).ToArray(),Di2015NewLine                    suffixPartition.Item2);Di2015NewLine                foreach (var subPartition in subPartitions) {Di2015NewLine                    yield return subPartition;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static IEnumerable<Tuple<T[], T[]>> GetTuplePartitions<T>(Di2015NewLine            T[] elements)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // No result if less than 2 elementsDi2015NewLine            if (elements.Length < 2) yield break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Generate all 2-part partitionsDi2015NewLine            for (int pattern = 1; pattern < 1 << (elements.Length - 1); pattern++) {Di2015NewLine                // Create the two result sets andDi2015NewLine                // assign the first element to the first setDi2015NewLine                List<T>[] resultSets = {Di2015NewLine                    new List<T> { elements[0] }, new List<T>() };Di2015NewLine                // Distribute the remaining elementsDi2015NewLine                for (int index = 1; index < elements.Length; index++) {Di2015NewLine                    resultSets[(pattern >> (index - 1)) & 1].Add(elements[index]);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                yield return Tuple.Create(Di2015NewLine                    resultSets[0].ToArray(), resultSets[1].ToArray());Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20537260Di2015UniqueSeparator// final Request selectionDi2015NewLineSELECT request.[RequestId] Di2015NewLine FROM [Request] request Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   // Only requests, which are successful, and have Max(date)Di2015NewLine   WHERE request.[RequestId] IN Di2015NewLine   (Di2015NewLine     SELECT successResponse.RequestId as y0_ Di2015NewLine      FROM [Response] successResponse Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // response which max date is equal to the upper responseDi2015NewLine        // and which RequestId corresponds with supper upper RequestDi2015NewLine        WHERE EXISTSDi2015NewLine        (Di2015NewLine          SELECT maxResponse.RequestId as y0_Di2015NewLine           , max(maxResponse.[DateTime]) as y1_           Di2015NewLine           FROM [Response] maxResponse Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine           // do the MAX only for current RequestDi2015NewLine           WHERE maxResponse.RequestId = successResponse.RequestId Di2015NewLine           GROUP BY maxResponse.RequestId Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine           // assure that the Response match is on the max DateTimeDi2015NewLine           HAVING max(maxResponse.[DateTime]) = successResponse.[DateTime]Di2015NewLine        ) Di2015NewLine        AND successResponse.[Success] = 1Di2015NewLine   )Di2015NewLine
20537260Di2015UniqueSeparatorRequestId
20537260Di2015UniqueSeparator//
20537260Di2015UniqueSeparator--
20537260Di2015UniqueSeparator// This declaration will allow us, to use a reference from middle SELECTDi2015NewLine// in the most deeper SELECTDi2015NewLineResponse response = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// the most INNER SELECTDi2015NewLinevar maxSubquery = QueryOver.Of<Response>()Di2015NewLine   .SelectList(l => lDi2015NewLine    .SelectGroup(item => item.RequestId)Di2015NewLine    .SelectMax(item => item.DateTime)Di2015NewLine    )Di2015NewLine    // WHERE ClauseDi2015NewLine   .Where(item => item.RequestId == response.RequestId)Di2015NewLine   // HAVING ClauseDi2015NewLine   .Where(Restrictions.EqProperty(Di2015NewLine      Projections.Max<Response>(item => item.DateTime),Di2015NewLine      Projections.Property(() => response.DateTime)Di2015NewLine    ));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// the middle SELECTDi2015NewLinevar successSubquery = QueryOver.Of<Response>(() => response)Di2015NewLine    // to filter the RequestDi2015NewLine    .Select(res => res.RequestId)Di2015NewLine    .WithSubqueryDi2015NewLine    .WhereExists(maxSubquery)Di2015NewLine    // now only these wich are successfulDi2015NewLine    .Where(success => success.Success == true)Di2015NewLine    ;Di2015NewLine
20537260Di2015UniqueSeparator// the most outer SELECTDi2015NewLinevar query = session.QueryOver<Request>();Di2015NewLinequery.WithSubqueryDi2015NewLine    // our Request ID is IN(...Di2015NewLine    .WhereProperty(r => r.ID)Di2015NewLine    .In(successSubquery);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevar list = queryDi2015NewLine    .List<Request>();Di2015NewLine
20537273Di2015UniqueSeparatorParallelLoopResult
20537273Di2015UniqueSeparatorParallel.ForEach
20537273Di2015UniqueSeparatorStop()
20537273Di2015UniqueSeparatorBreak()
20537273Di2015UniqueSeparatorStop()
20537273Di2015UniqueSeparatorBreak()
20537273Di2015UniqueSeparator   private long? lowestBreakIndex = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void StartProcess()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        isPaused = IsTerminated = false;Di2015NewLine        isProcessing = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        ParallelLoopResult result = Parallel.ForEach(Di2015NewLine            items.Skip(lowestBreakIndex ?? 0) //I am assuming that items is some form of ICollection. The Skip function will skip to the next item to processDi2015NewLine            , new ParallelOptions() { MaxDegreeOfParallelism = 4 }, (item, state) =>Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                //I swapped these two.Di2015NewLine                if (isPaused) Di2015NewLine                    state.Break();Di2015NewLine                else if (IsTerminated) Di2015NewLine                    state.Stop();Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                    item.Process();Di2015NewLine            });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        lowestBreakIndex = result.LowestBreakIteration;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        isPaused = IsTerminated = false;Di2015NewLine        isProcessing = false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

20542854Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing Microsoft.Phone.Controls;Di2015NewLineusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Windows.Controls.Primitives;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// This class detects the pull gesture on a LongListSelector. How does it work?Di2015NewLine/// Di2015NewLine///     This class listens to the change of manipulation state of the LLS, to the MouseMove event Di2015NewLine///     (in WP, this event is triggered when the user moves the finger through the screen)Di2015NewLine///     and to the ItemRealized/Unrealized events.Di2015NewLine///     Di2015NewLine///     Listening to MouseMove, we can calculate the amount of finger movement. That is, we can Di2015NewLine///     detect when the user has scrolled the list.Di2015NewLine///     Di2015NewLine///     Then, when the ManipulationState changes from Manipulating to Animating (from user Di2015NewLine///     triggered movement to inertia movement), we check the viewport changes. The viewport is Di2015NewLine///     only constant when the user scrolls beyond the end of the list, either at the top or at the bottom.Di2015NewLine///     If no items were added, check the direction of the scroll movement and fire the corresponding event.Di2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLinepublic class WP8PullDetectorDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    LongListSelector listbox;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    bool viewportChanged = false;Di2015NewLine    bool isMoving = false;Di2015NewLine    double manipulationStart = 0;Di2015NewLine    double manipulationEnd = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool Bound { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Bind(LongListSelector listbox)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Bound = true;Di2015NewLine        this.listbox = listbox;Di2015NewLine        listbox.ManipulationStateChanged += listbox_ManipulationStateChanged;Di2015NewLine        listbox.MouseMove += listbox_MouseMove;Di2015NewLine        listbox.ItemRealized += OnViewportChanged;Di2015NewLine        listbox.ItemUnrealized += OnViewportChanged;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Unbind()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Bound = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (listbox != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            listbox.ManipulationStateChanged -= listbox_ManipulationStateChanged;Di2015NewLine            listbox.MouseMove -= listbox_MouseMove;Di2015NewLine            listbox.ItemRealized -= OnViewportChanged;Di2015NewLine            listbox.ItemUnrealized -= OnViewportChanged;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void OnViewportChanged(object sender, Microsoft.Phone.Controls.ItemRealizationEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        viewportChanged = true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void listbox_MouseMove(object sender, System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var pos = e.GetPosition(null);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (!isMoving)Di2015NewLine            manipulationStart = pos.Y;Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            manipulationEnd = pos.Y;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        isMoving = true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void listbox_ManipulationStateChanged(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (listbox.ManipulationState == ManipulationState.Idle)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            isMoving = false;Di2015NewLine            viewportChanged = false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (listbox.ManipulationState == ManipulationState.Manipulating)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            viewportChanged = false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (listbox.ManipulationState == ManipulationState.Animating)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var total = manipulationStart - manipulationEnd;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (!viewportChanged && Compression != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (total < 0)Di2015NewLine                    Compression(this, new CompressionEventArgs(CompressionType.Top));Di2015NewLine                else if(total > 0) // Explicitly exclude total == 0 caseDi2015NewLine                    Compression(this, new CompressionEventArgs(CompressionType.Bottom));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public event OnCompression Compression;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class CompressionEventArgs : EventArgsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public CompressionType Type { get; protected set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public CompressionEventArgs(CompressionType type)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Type = type;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic enum CompressionType { Top, Bottom, Left, Right };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic delegate void OnCompression(object sender, CompressionEventArgs e);Di2015NewLine

20545754Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar strings = new [] { "burg", "wood", "town" };Di2015NewLine// just some sample dataDi2015NewLinevar cities = new[] { new City("Capetown"), new City("Hamburg"), new City("New York"), new City("Farwood") };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevar param = Expression.Parameter(typeof(City));Di2015NewLinevar cityName = Expression.PropertyOrField(param, "Name"); // change the property nameDi2015NewLineExpression condition = Expression.Constant(false);Di2015NewLineforeach (var s in strings)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var expr = Expression.Call(cityName, "Contains", Type.EmptyTypes, Expression.Constant(s));Di2015NewLine    condition = Expression.OrElse(condition, expr);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// you can apply the .Where call to any query. 20545860Di2015UniqueSeparator    private static long maxSize = 5 * 1024 * 1024;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        GetDirectorySize(new DirectoryInfo(@"d:\\"));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static long GetDirectorySize(DirectoryInfo dir)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        long size = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach(DirectoryInfo d in dir.EnumerateDirectories("*",SearchOption.TopDirectoryOnly)) {Di2015NewLine            size += GetDirectorySize(d);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        size += dir.EnumerateFiles("*",SearchOption.TopDirectoryOnly).Sum(fi => fi.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (size > maxSize)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Directory: {0} Size: {1}", dir, size);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return size;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

20547615Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static Visual GetDescendantByType(Visual element, Type type)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  if (element == null) {Di2015NewLine    return null;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  if (element.GetType() == type) {Di2015NewLine    return element;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  Visual foundElement = null;Di2015NewLine  if (element is FrameworkElement) {Di2015NewLine    (element as FrameworkElement).ApplyTemplate();Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  for (int i = 0; i < VisualTreeHelper.GetChildrenCount(element); i++) {Di2015NewLine    Visual visual = VisualTreeHelper.GetChild(element, i) as Visual;Di2015NewLine    foundElement = GetDescendantByType(visual, type);Di2015NewLine    if (foundElement != null) {Di2015NewLine      break;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  return foundElement;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20549820Di2015UniqueSeparator    //A class to hold the individual pieces of dataDi2015NewLine    public class ItemDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public string Name = "";Di2015NewLine        public int Qty = 0;Di2015NewLine        public double Price = 0;Di2015NewLine        public int QtySold = 0;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public Item FindItem(string filename, string itemname)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //An object of type Item that will hold the specific valuesDi2015NewLine        Item output = new Item();Di2015NewLine        //The using block handles automatic disposal of the streamreaderDi2015NewLine        using(StreamReader sr = new StreamReader(filename))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //Read the file until the end is reachedDi2015NewLine            while(!sr.EndOfStream)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                //Check the string from the file against the item name you'reDi2015NewLine                //looking for.Di2015NewLine                string temp = sr.ReadLine().Trim();Di2015NewLine                if(temp == itemname)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    //Once we find it, throw away the empty line and startDi2015NewLine                    //assigning the data to the output object.Di2015NewLine                    sr.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine                    output.Name = temp;Di2015NewLine                    output.Qty = int.Parse(sr.ReadLine());Di2015NewLine                    output.Price = double.Parse(sr.ReadLine());Di2015NewLine                    output.QtySold = int.Parse(sr.ReadLine());Di2015NewLine                    //Since we found the item we're looking, there's no needDi2015NewLine                    //to keep loopingDi2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        //The file is closed and output will either have real data or an emptyDi2015NewLine        //name and the rest all 0'sDi2015NewLine        return output;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
20549828Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static void WaitForElementNotPresent(this ISearchContext driver, By locator)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        driver.TimerLoop(() => driver.FindElement(locator).Displayed, true, "Timeout: Element did not go away at: " + locator);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void WaitForElementToAppear(this ISearchContext driver, By locator)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        driver.TimerLoop(() => driver.FindElement(locator).Displayed, false, "Timeout: Element not visible at: " + locator);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void TimerLoop(this ISearchContext driver, Func<bool> isComplete, bool exceptionCompleteResult, string timeoutMsg)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        const int timeoutinteger = 10;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int second = 0; ; second++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (isComplete())Di2015NewLine                    return;Di2015NewLine                if (second >= timeoutinteger)Di2015NewLine                    throw new TimeoutException(timeoutMsg);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (exceptionCompleteResult)Di2015NewLine                    return;Di2015NewLine                if (second >= timeoutinteger)Di2015NewLine                    throw new TimeoutException(timeoutMsg, ex);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            Thread.Sleep(100);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

Di2015NewLineNetworkStream stream = client.GetStream();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Read the message to the connected TcpServer.Di2015NewLineByte[] data = new Byte[5];Di2015NewLineList<byte> dataBytes = new List<byte>();Di2015NewLinestream.Read(data, 0, data.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Receive the Stream and Convert to HexDi2015NewLineforeach (byte a in data)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    dataBytes.Add(a);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinestring hexDatabytes = BitConverter.ToString(dataBytes.ToArray());Di2015NewLineConsole.WriteLine("Received: {0}", hexDatabytes);Di2015NewLine

20553208Di2015UniqueSeparator  public static string MyMethod(Expression<Func<Student, object>> func) {Di2015NewLine     return GetMemeberName(func)Di2015NewLine  } Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public static string GetMemberName(Expression expression)Di2015NewLine    {            Di2015NewLine        if (expression is LambdaExpression)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var lambdaExpression = (LambdaExpression)expression;Di2015NewLine            return GetMemberName(lambdaExpression.Body);                              Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (expression is MemberExpression)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var memberExpression = (MemberExpression)expression;Di2015NewLine            if (memberExpression.Expression.NodeType == ExpressionType.MemberAccess)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return GetMemberName(memberExpression.Expression)+ "."+ memberExpression.Member.Name;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return memberExpression.Member.Name;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (expression is UnaryExpression)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var unaryExpression = (UnaryExpression)expression;Di2015NewLine           if (unaryExpression.NodeType != ExpressionType.Convert)Di2015NewLine                throw new Exception(string.Format(Di2015NewLine                    "Cannot interpret member from {0}",Di2015NewLine                    expression));Di2015NewLine            return GetMemberName(unaryExpression.Operand);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        throw new Exception(string.Format("Could not determine member from {0}",expression));Di2015NewLine    }  Di2015NewLine

20554262Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void PrintProperties(object obj, int indent)Di2015NewLine{    Di2015NewLine    if (obj == null) return;Di2015NewLine    string indentString = new string(' ', indent);Di2015NewLine    Type objType = obj.GetType();Di2015NewLine    PropertyInfo[] properties = objType.GetProperties();Di2015NewLine    foreach (PropertyInfo property in properties)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        object propValue = property.GetValue(obj, null);Di2015NewLine        var elems = propValue as IList;Di2015NewLine        if (elems != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            foreach (var item in elems)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                PrintProperties(item, indent + 3);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // This will not cut-off System.Collections because of the first checkDi2015NewLine            if (property.PropertyType.Assembly == objType.Assembly)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("{0}{1}:", indentString, property.Name);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                PrintProperties(propValue, indent + 2);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("{0}{1}: {2}", indentString, property.Name, propValue);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20555746Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic decimal Trekking(int Maxwaarde, int AantalGewenst) {Di2015NewLine  decimal result = ERROR;Di2015NewLine  if (Maxwaarde > 90) {Di2015NewLine    MessageBox.Show("Uw getal mag niet boven de 90 zijn!");Di2015NewLine    return result;Di2015NewLine  } else if (Maxwaarde < 0) {Di2015NewLine    MessageBox.Show("Dit aantal is niet mogelijk!");Di2015NewLine    return result;Di2015NewLine  } else if (AantalGewenst > 45) {Di2015NewLine    MessageBox.Show("Uw getal mag niet boven de 45 zijn!");Di2015NewLine    return result;Di2015NewLine  } else if (AantalGewenst < 0) {Di2015NewLine    MessageBox.Show("Dit aantal is niet mogelijk!");Di2015NewLine    return result;Di2015NewLine  } else if (Maxwaarde / AantalGewenst < 2) {Di2015NewLine    MessageBox.Show("Uw maxwaarde moet minstens het dubbele van Aantal Gewenst zijn!");Di2015NewLine    return result;Di2015NewLine  } else {Di2015NewLine    if (AantalGewenst <= 45)Di2015NewLine      IsTenEinde = true;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  var random = new Random();Di2015NewLine  var getallen = new int[AantalGewenst];Di2015NewLine  this.Maxwaarde = Maxwaarde;Di2015NewLine  this.AantalGewenst = AantalGewenst;Di2015NewLine  result = (decimal)Maxwaarde / (decimal)AantalGewenst;Di2015NewLine  AantalGetrokken = 0;Di2015NewLine  IsTenEinde = false;Di2015NewLine  return result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20559183Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static int BricksPerDimension(int dimWidth, int dimLength, int dimHeight, int brickSideWidth, int brickSideLength, int brickSideHeight)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   int maxBricks = 0;Di2015NewLine   int curBricks = 0;Di2015NewLine   int l, w, h;Di2015NewLine   l = w = h = 0;Di2015NewLine   for (int i = 0; i < 6; i++)Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      switch (i)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine         case 0:Di2015NewLine            l = brickSideLength;Di2015NewLine            h = brickSideHeight;Di2015NewLine            w = brickSideWidth;Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         case 1:Di2015NewLine            l = brickSideLength;Di2015NewLine            w = brickSideHeight;Di2015NewLine            h = brickSideWidth;Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         case 2:Di2015NewLine            w = brickSideLength;Di2015NewLine            l = brickSideHeight;Di2015NewLine            h = brickSideWidth;Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         case 3:Di2015NewLine            w = brickSideLength;Di2015NewLine            h = brickSideHeight;Di2015NewLine            l = brickSideWidth;Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         case 4:Di2015NewLine            h = brickSideLength;Di2015NewLine            l = brickSideHeight;Di2015NewLine            w = brickSideWidth;Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         case 5:Di2015NewLine            h = brickSideLength;Di2015NewLine            w = brickSideHeight;Di2015NewLine            l = brickSideWidth;Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      curBricks = ((int)dimLength / l)Di2015NewLine               * ((int)dimWidth / w)Di2015NewLine               * ((int)dimHeight / h);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      if (curBricks > maxBricks)Di2015NewLine         maxBricks = curBricks;Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   return maxBricks;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

                  .ToList();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void ProcessUrl()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string current;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // keep grabbing   }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void FindWIN(string url)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // your code hereDi2015NewLine        // as a demo, sleep a sort-of-random time between 0 and 100 msDi2015NewLine        Thread.Sleep(Math.Abs(url.GetHashCode()) % 100);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void UpdateProgress()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // work out what 20570353Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<T> Filter<T>(IEnumerable<T> source, string searchStr)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var propsToCheck = typeof (T).GetProperties().Where(a => a.PropertyType == typeof(string));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var filter = propsToCheck.Aggregate(string.Empty, (s, p) => (s == string.Empty ? string.Empty : string.Format("{0} OR ", s)) + string.Format("{0} == @0", p.Name));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var filtered = source.AsQueryable().Where(filter, searchStr);Di2015NewLine    return filtered;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20570607Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static T[,] ToMultiD<T>(this T[][] jArray)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int i = jArray.Count();Di2015NewLine        int j = jArray.Select(x => x.Count()).Aggregate(0, (current, c) => (current > c) ? current : c);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var mArray = new T[i, j];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int ii = 0; ii < i; ii++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            for (int jj = 0; jj < j; jj++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                mArray[ii, jj] = jArray[ii][jj];Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return mArray;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static T[][] ToJagged<T>(this T[,] mArray)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var cols = mArray.GetLength(0);Di2015NewLine        var rows = mArray.GetLength(1);Di2015NewLine        var jArray = new T[cols][];Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < cols; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            jArray[i] = new T[rows];Di2015NewLine            for (int j = 0; j < rows; j++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                jArray[i][j] = mArray[i, j];Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return jArray;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

20570907Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class OrmLiteBinaryCreateExtensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// WARNING: this will drop all of the existing varbinary columns!Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public static void UpdateByteToBinary<T>(this IDbConnection dbConn)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var modelDef = ModelDefinition<T>.Definition;Di2015NewLine        var tableName = OrmLiteConfig.DialectProvider.GetQuotedTableName(modelDef);Di2015NewLine        var definitions = modelDef.FieldDefinitions.Where<FieldDefinition>(f => f.FieldType == typeof(byte[]));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (var def in definitions)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var columnName = OrmLiteConfig.DialectProvider.GetQuotedColumnName(def.FieldName);Di2015NewLine            dbConn.ExecuteNonQuery(string.Format("ALTER TABLE {0} DROP COLUMN {1}", tableName, columnName));Di2015NewLine            dbConn.ExecuteNonQuery(string.Format("ALTER TABLE {0} ADD {1} [varbinary](max) filestream NULL", tableName, columnName));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
20570907Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing (IDbConnection db = dbFactory.OpenDbConnection())Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // create temp file, read bytes, delete itDi2015NewLine    var tmp = Path.GetTempFileName();Di2015NewLine    using (var fs = new FileStream(tmp, FileMode.OpenOrCreate))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var textBytes = System.Text.Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes("some text");Di2015NewLine        fs.Write(textBytes, 0, textBytes.Length);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    byte[] bytes = File.ReadAllBytes(tmp);Di2015NewLine    File.Delete(tmp);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // stand up data in orm liteDi2015NewLine    db.CreateTableIfNotExists<FileExample>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // here is our extension method - note that this will drop the entire file columnDi2015NewLine    // and lose all existing dataDi2015NewLine    db.UpdateByteToBinary<FileExample>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    db.Insert<FileExample>(new FileExample { Name = "my new file", FileBytes = bytes  });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // read data back to ensure it saved properlyDi2015NewLine    var files = db.Select<FileExample>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    using (var ms = new MemoryStream(files[0].FileBytes))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var someText = System.Text.Encoding.UTF8.GetString(files[0].FileBytes);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(someText);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    db.DropTable<FileExample>();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20571988Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic TTarget MapToViewModel<TSource, TTarget>(TSource source)Di2015NewLine    where TTarget : new()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var sourceType = source.GetType();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var targetProperties = typeof(TTarget).GetProperties(BindingFlags.Public | BindingFlags.Instance);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var sourceProperties = sourceType.GetProperties(BindingFlags.Public | BindingFlags.Instance);Di2015NewLine    var sourceMethods = sourceType.GetMethods(BindingFlags.Public | BindingFlags.Instance);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var target = Activator.CreateInstance<TTarget>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (var prop in targetProperties)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var sourceProp = sourceProperties.FirstOrDefault(x => x.Name == prop.Name);Di2015NewLine        if (sourceProp != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            prop.SetValue(target, sourceProp.GetValue(source, null), null);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var sourceMethod = sourceMethods.FirstOrDefault(x => x.Name == "Get" + prop.Name);Di2015NewLine            if (sourceMethod != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                prop.SetValue(target, sourceMethod.Invoke(source, null), null);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return target;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20576173Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Specialized;Di2015NewLineusing System.Diagnostics;Di2015NewLineusing System.IO;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing System.Net;Di2015NewLineusing System.Security.Cryptography;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text;Di2015NewLineusing System.Threading.Tasks;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace EncryptionClientDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    class CryptoMasterDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private string encryptedText;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void StartEncryption()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("");Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("----- Client Start -----");Di2015NewLine            string plainText = "Hello, this is a message we need to encrypt";Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Plain Text = " + plainText);Di2015NewLine            string passPhrase ="Pass Phrase Can be any length";Di2015NewLine            string saltValue = DateTime.Now.ToLongTimeString(); //slat should be 8 bite len, in my case im using Time HH:MM:SS as it is dynamic valueDi2015NewLine            string hashAlgorithm = "SHA1";Di2015NewLine            int passwordIterations = 1;Di2015NewLine            string initVector = "InitVector Should be 32 bite len";Di2015NewLine            int keySize = 256;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            encryptedText = Encrypt(plainText, passPhrase, saltValue, hashAlgorithm, passwordIterations, initVector, keySize);Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Encrypted Text = " + encryptedText);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            string decryptedText = Decrypt(encryptedText, passPhrase, saltValue, hashAlgorithm, passwordIterations, initVector, keySize);Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Decripted Text = " + decryptedText);Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("----- Client End -----");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            SendDataToWebServer(plainText, passPhrase, saltValue, hashAlgorithm, passwordIterations, initVector, keySize);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void SendDataToWebServer(string plainText, string passPhrase, string saltValue, string hashAlgorithm, int passwordIterations, string initVector, int keySize)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            NameValueCollection POST = new NameValueCollection();Di2015NewLine            //NOTE: I'm Including all this data to POST only for TESTING PURPOSE Di2015NewLine            //and to avoid manual entering of the same data at server side.Di2015NewLine            //In real live example you have to keep sensative data hiddenDi2015NewLine            POST.Add("plainText", plainText);Di2015NewLine            POST.Add("passPhrase", passPhrase);Di2015NewLine            POST.Add("saltValue", saltValue);Di2015NewLine            POST.Add("hashAlgorithm", hashAlgorithm);Di2015NewLine            POST.Add("passwordIterations", passwordIterations+"");Di2015NewLine            POST.Add("initVector", initVector);Di2015NewLine            POST.Add("keySize", keySize+"");Di2015NewLine            POST.Add("encryptedText", encryptedText);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            WebClient web = new WebClient();Di2015NewLine            string URL = "http://localhost/Encryptor.php";Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("");Di2015NewLine            string serverRespond = Encoding.UTF8.GetString(web.UploadValues(URL, "POST", POST));Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("----- Server Start -----");Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(serverRespond);Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("----- Server End -----");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public string Encrypt(string plainText, string passPhrase, string saltValue, string hashAlgorithm, int passwordIterations, string initVector, int keySize)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            byte[] initVectorBytes = Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes(initVector);Di2015NewLine            byte[] saltValueBytes = Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes(saltValue);Di2015NewLine            byte[] plainTextBytes = Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(plainText);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Rfc2898DeriveBytes password = new Rfc2898DeriveBytes(passPhrase, saltValueBytes, passwordIterations);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            byte[] keyBytes = password.GetBytes(keySize / 8);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            RijndaelManaged symmetricKey = new RijndaelManaged();Di2015NewLine            symmetricKey.BlockSize = 256;Di2015NewLine            symmetricKey.KeySize = 256;Di2015NewLine            symmetricKey.Padding = PaddingMode.Zeros;Di2015NewLine            symmetricKey.Mode = CipherMode.CBC;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            ICryptoTransform encryptor = symmetricKey.CreateEncryptor(keyBytes, initVectorBytes);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            MemoryStream memoryStream = new MemoryStream();Di2015NewLine            CryptoStream cryptoStream = new CryptoStream(memoryStream, encryptor, CryptoStreamMode.Write);Di2015NewLine            cryptoStream.Write(plainTextBytes, 0, plainTextBytes.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            cryptoStream.FlushFinalBlock();Di2015NewLine            byte[] cipherTextBytes = memoryStream.ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            memoryStream.Close();Di2015NewLine            cryptoStream.Close();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            string cipherText = Convert.ToBase64String(cipherTextBytes);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return cipherText;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static string Decrypt(string cipherText, string passPhrase, string saltValue, string hashAlgorithm, int passwordIterations, string initVector, int keySize)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            byte[] initVectorBytes = Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes(initVector);Di2015NewLine            byte[] saltValueBytes = Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes(saltValue);Di2015NewLine            byte[] cipherTextBytes = Convert.FromBase64String(cipherText);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Rfc2898DeriveBytes password = new Rfc2898DeriveBytes(passPhrase, saltValueBytes, passwordIterations);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            byte[] keyBytes = password.GetBytes(keySize / 8);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            RijndaelManaged symmetricKey = new RijndaelManaged();Di2015NewLine            symmetricKey.BlockSize = 256;Di2015NewLine            symmetricKey.KeySize = 256;Di2015NewLine            symmetricKey.Padding = PaddingMode.Zeros;Di2015NewLine            symmetricKey.Mode = CipherMode.CBC;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            ICryptoTransform decryptor = symmetricKey.CreateDecryptor(keyBytes, initVectorBytes);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            MemoryStream memoryStream = new MemoryStream(cipherTextBytes);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            CryptoStream cryptoStream = new CryptoStream(memoryStream, decryptor, CryptoStreamMode.Read);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            byte[] plainTextBytes = new byte[cipherTextBytes.Length];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            int decryptedByteCount = cryptoStream.Read(plainTextBytes, 0, plainTextBytes.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            memoryStream.Close();Di2015NewLine            cryptoStream.Close();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            string plainText = Encoding.UTF8.GetString(plainTextBytes, 0, decryptedByteCount);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return plainText;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
20576173Di2015UniqueSeparator<?phpDi2015NewLineerror_reporting(0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineif (isset($_POST['plainText'])) {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    $plainText = $_POST['plainText'];Di2015NewLine    $passPhrase = $_POST['passPhrase'];Di2015NewLine    $saltValue = $_POST['saltValue'];Di2015NewLine    $hashAlgorithm = $_POST['hashAlgorithm'];Di2015NewLine    $passwordIterations = $_POST['passwordIterations'];Di2015NewLine    $initVector = $_POST['initVector'];Di2015NewLine    $keySize = $_POST['keySize'];Di2015NewLine    $clientEncryptedText = $_POST['encryptedText'];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    $key = getKey($passPhrase,$saltValue, $passwordIterations, $keySize, $hashAlgorithm);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    echo "Plain Text = ".$plainText."\\n";Di2015NewLine    echo "Client Encrypted Text = ".$clientEncryptedText."\\n";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    $encryptedText = base64_encode(mcrypt_encrypt(MCRYPT_RIJNDAEL_256, $key, $plainText, MCRYPT_MODE_CBC, $initVector));Di2015NewLine    echo "Server Encrypted Text = ".$encryptedText."\\n";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    $decryptedText = rtrim(mcrypt_decrypt(MCRYPT_RIJNDAEL_256, $key, base64_decode($encryptedText), MCRYPT_MODE_CBC, $initVector), "\\0");Di2015NewLine    echo "Server Decrypted Text = ".$decryptedText."\\n";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    $decryptedText = rtrim(mcrypt_decrypt(MCRYPT_RIJNDAEL_256, $key, base64_decode($clientEncryptedText), MCRYPT_MODE_CBC, $initVector), "\\0");Di2015NewLine    echo "Client Decrypted Text = ".$decryptedText;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinefunction getKey( $passPhrase, $saltValue, $passwordIterations, $keySize, $hashAlgorithm ) {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    $hl = strlen(hash($hashAlgorithm, null, true));Di2015NewLine    $kb = ceil($keySize / $hl);Di2015NewLine    $dk = '';Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for ( $block = 1; $block <= $kb; $block ++ ) {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        $ib = $b = hash_hmac($hashAlgorithm, $saltValue . pack('N', $block), $passPhrase, true);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for ( $i = 1; $i < $passwordIterations; $i ++ )Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            $ib ^= ($b = hash_hmac($hashAlgorithm, $b, $passPhrase, true));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        $dk .= $ib;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return substr($dk, 0, $keySize);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine?>Di2015NewLine

i < a.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            a[i] = '_';Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Tell the user the number of letters through the dashesDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i <a.Length ; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.Write(a[i]+ "  ");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // ask the user to guessDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int count = 0;Di2015NewLine        doDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Enter your guess letter");Di2015NewLine            char input = Console.ReadLine().ToCharArray()[0];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < secreteWord.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                //if the user guessed right, replace the correct dash and display to the userDi2015NewLine                if (secreteWord[i] == input)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    count++; 20578468Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static IQueryable<Db.Category> FilterContains(string searchFor, string excludedBrFields, IQueryable<Db.Category> categories)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (searchFor.StartsWith("*") && searchFor.EndsWith("*"))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        searchFor = searchFor.Substring(1, searchFor.Length - 2);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    searchFor = searchFor.ToLower();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var predicate = PredicateBuilder.False<Db.Category>();Di2015NewLine    if (!excludedBrFields.Contains("Title"))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        predicate = predicate.Or(x => x.Title.ToLower().Contains(searchFor));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (!excludedBrFields.Contains("Description"))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        predicate = predicate.Or(x => x.Description != null && x.Description.ToLower().Contains(searchFor));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (!excludedBrFields.Contains("Comments"))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        predicate = predicate.Or(x => x.Comments != null && x.Comments.ToLower().Contains(searchFor));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return categories.Where(predicate.Compile()).AsQueryable();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20586874Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class MissingInterfaceMemberImplementationVisitor : DepthFirstAstVisitorDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly CSharpAstResolver _resolver;Di2015NewLine    public bool IsInterfaceMemberMissing { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine    public MissingInterfaceMemberImplementationVisitor(CSharpAstResolver resolver)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _resolver = resolver;Di2015NewLine        IsInterfaceMemberMissing = false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override void VisitTypeDeclaration(TypeDeclaration typeDeclaration)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (typeDeclaration.ClassType == ClassType.Interface || typeDeclaration.ClassType == ClassType.Enum)Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLine        base.VisitTypeDeclaration(typeDeclaration);Di2015NewLine        var rr = _resolver.Resolve(typeDeclaration);Di2015NewLine        if (rr.IsError)Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLine        foreach (var baseType in typeDeclaration.BaseTypes)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var bt = _resolver.Resolve(baseType);Di2015NewLine            if (bt.IsError || bt.Type.Kind != TypeKind.Interface)Di2015NewLine                continue;Di2015NewLine            bool interfaceMissing;Di2015NewLine            var toImplement = ImplementInterfaceAction.CollectMembersToImplement(rr.Type.GetDefinition(), bt.Type, false, out interfaceMissing);Di2015NewLine            if (toImplement.Count == 0)Di2015NewLine                continue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            IsInterfaceMemberMissing = true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
20586874Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar solutionFiles = new List<FileInfo>();Di2015NewLinevar trees = new Dictionary<FileInfo, SyntaxTree>();Di2015NewLineIProjectContent projectContent = new CSharpProjectContent();Di2015NewLineforeach (var file in solutionFiles.Where(f => f.Extension == ".cs").Distinct())Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var parser = new ICSharpCode.NRefactory.CSharp.CSharpParser();Di2015NewLine    SyntaxTree syntaxTree;Di2015NewLine    using (var fs = new FileStream(file.FullName, FileMode.Open, FileAccess.Read, FileShare.Read, 4096, FileOptions.SequentialScan))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        syntaxTree = parser.Parse(fs, file.FullName);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    trees.Add(file, syntaxTree);Di2015NewLine    var unresolvedFile = syntaxTree.ToTypeSystem();Di2015NewLine    projectContent = projectContent.AddOrUpdateFiles(unresolvedFile);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinevar compilation = projectContent.CreateCompilation();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineforeach (var sharpFile in trees)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var originalResolver = new CSharpAstResolver(compilation, sharpFile.Value, sharpFile.Value.ToTypeSystem());Di2015NewLine    var visitor = new MissingInterfaceMemberImplementationVisitor(originalResolver);Di2015NewLine    sharpFile.Value.AcceptVisitor(visitor);Di2015NewLine    if (visitor.IsInterfaceMemberMissing)Di2015NewLine       return false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLinereturn true;Di2015NewLine

20587844Di2015UniqueSeparator//define some variables first, note that don't rely on the Di2015NewLine//ProgressBarRenderer.ChunkThickness and ProgressBarRenderer.ChunkSpaceThicknessDi2015NewLine//because they are actually small and using our own variables will allow us to changeDi2015NewLine//the chunk size easily.Di2015NewLineint chunkThickness = 13;Di2015NewLineint chunkSpace = 1;Di2015NewLineRectangle chunkRect = new Rectangle(0, 0, chunkThickness,Di2015NewLine                          toolStripProgressBar1.ProgressBar.Height-4);Di2015NewLine//The hosted ProgressBar's Paint event handlerDi2015NewLineprivate void progressBar_Paint(object sender, PaintEventArgs e){Di2015NewLine  chunkRect.Location = Point.Empty;Di2015NewLine  chunkRect.Offset(2, 2);                Di2015NewLine  var percent = (float) toolStripProgressBar1.Value / toolStripProgressBar1.Maximum;Di2015NewLine  var valueLength = percent * toolStripProgressBar1.ProgressBar.Width;Di2015NewLine  var chunks = (int) (valueLength / (chunkThickness + chunkSpace) + 0.5f);Di2015NewLine  for (int i = 0; i < chunks; i++) {Di2015NewLine     //I use the green color for the chunk color, it's up to you.Di2015NewLine     e.Graphics.FillRectangle(Brushes.Green, chunkRect);                    Di2015NewLine     chunkRect.Offset(chunkThickness + chunkSpace, 0);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  ControlPaint.DrawBorder3D(e.Graphics, toolStripProgressBar1.ProgressBar.ClientRectangle,Di2015NewLine                           Border3DStyle.SunkenOuter);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine//Now in your form constructor, just add this code to end up everything beforeDi2015NewLine//trying running the code:Di2015NewLinepublic Form1(){Di2015NewLine   InitializeComponent();Di2015NewLine   //do this to allow the Paint event to be fired and more ...Di2015NewLine   typeof(Control).GetMethod("SetStyle", System.Reflection.BindingFlags.NonPublic |Di2015NewLine                                         System.Reflection.BindingFlags.Instance)Di2015NewLine                  .Invoke(toolStripProgressBar1.ProgressBar, Di2015NewLine                          new object[] {ControlStyles.UserPaint |Di2015NewLine                                        ControlStyles.OptimizedDoubleBuffer, true });Di2015NewLine   //hook up the progressBar_Paint event handler for the hosted ProgressBarDi2015NewLine   toolStripProgressBar1.ProgressBar.Paint += progressBar_Paint;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
20587844Di2015UniqueSeparatorprogressBar_Paint
20587844Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void progressBar_Paint(object sender, PaintEventArgs e){Di2015NewLine  var percent = (float) toolStripProgressBar1.Value / toolStripProgressBar1.Maximum;Di2015NewLine  var valueLength = percent * toolStripProgressBar1.ProgressBar.Width;Di2015NewLine  var chunkRect = new RectangleF(2,2,valueLength,Di2015NewLine                                 toolStripProgressBar1.ProgressBar.Height-4);Di2015NewLine  e.Graphics.FillRectangle(Brushes.Green, chunkRect);Di2015NewLine  ControlPaint.DrawBorder3D(e.Graphics, toolStripProgressBar1.ProgressBar.ClientRectangle,Di2015NewLine                           Border3DStyle.SunkenOuter);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

createSound(IntPtr data, MODE mode, ref CREATESOUNDEXINFO exinfo, ref Sound sound)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            RESULT result = RESULT.OK;Di2015NewLine            IntPtr soundraw = 20593995Di2015UniqueSeparator        var startPar = Expression.Parameter(typeof (T), "start");Di2015NewLine        var endPar = Expression.Parameter(typeof (T), "end");Di2015NewLine        var amountPar = Expression.Parameter(typeof (float), "amount");Di2015NewLine        foreach (var fieldInfo in fields)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            MethodInfo mi;Di2015NewLine            if (fieldInfo.FieldType.IsAssignableFrom(typeof (float)))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                mi = typeof (Program).GetMethod("LerpF");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                mi = typeof (Program).GetMethod("Lerp").MakeGenericMethod(fieldInfo.FieldType);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var makeMemberAccess = Expression.Call(mi, Expression.MakeMemberAccess(startPar, fieldInfo), Expression.MakeMemberAccess(endPar, fieldInfo), amountPar);Di2015NewLine            binds.Add(Expression.Bind(fieldInfo, makeMemberAccess));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var memberInit = Expression.MemberInit(Expression.New(type), binds);Di2015NewLine        var expression = Expression.Lambda<Func<T, T, float, T>>(memberInit, startPar, endPar, amountPar);Di2015NewLine        Func<T, T, float, T> resultFunc = expression.Compile();Di2015NewLine        // can cache resultFuncDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var result = resultFunc(start, end, amount);Di2015NewLine

20594001Di2015UniqueSeparator// Define a method to return an IList of that data container class defined aboveDi2015NewLinepublic IList<SalesInfo> GetSalesInfo()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // please, as of .NET 2.0 - use the List<T> and stop using ArrayList!Di2015NewLine    IList<SalesInfo> list = new List<SalesInfo>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // put your context usage into using()..... blocks to ensure proper disposalDi2015NewLine        using (var context = new SabzNegar01Entities1())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine             // fetch the data, turn it into SalesInfo recordsDi2015NewLine             list = (from p in context.tbl_ReturnSalesFactor_DDi2015NewLine                     where p.DocNo == inDocNoDi2015NewLine                     select new SalesInfoDi2015NewLine                            {Di2015NewLine                                Row = p.Row,Di2015NewLine                                StockCode = p.StockCode,Di2015NewLine                                Description = p.tbl_Stock.PDescription,Di2015NewLine                                Fee = p.Fee,Di2015NewLine                                MainNum = p.MainNum,Di2015NewLine                                Add = p.MainNum*p.Fee,Di2015NewLine                                PureAdd = ((p.MainNum*p.Fee) - (p.MainNum*p.Discount)) + ((p.Tax + p.Charges)*p.MainNum),Di2015NewLine                                Discount = p.Discount*p.MainNum,Di2015NewLine                                TaxChange = (p.Tax + p.Charges)*p.MainNumDi2015NewLine                            }).ToList();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // if you get back no data -> add a dummy entryDi2015NewLine        if (list.Count <= 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine             list.Add(new SalesInfo { Description = "(no data found)" });Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        PMessageBox.Show(ex.Message, "Error in Reading  ReturnSalesFactor_Details Data");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // return the resulting listDi2015NewLine    return list;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20603979Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic bool CreateImage(Graphics g, GraphicsPath gp, Di2015NewLine    List<int> offsets, List<Color> colors)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    const scale = 100;Di2015NewLine    if (colors.Count < offsets.Count) return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //convert GraphicsPath path to Clipper paths ...Di2015NewLine    Clipper.Paths cpaths = GPathToCPaths(gp.Flatten(), scale);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //setup the ClipperOffset object ...Di2015NewLine    ClipperOffset co = new ClipperOffsets();Di2015NewLine    co.AddPaths(cpaths, JoinType.jtMiter, EndType.etClosedPolygon); Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //now loop through each offset ...Di2015NewLine    foreach(offset in offsets, color in colors)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      Clipper.Paths csolution = new Clipper.Paths();Di2015NewLine      co.Execute(csolution, offset);Di2015NewLine      if (csolution.IsEmpty) break; //useful for negative offsetsDi2015NewLine      //now convert back to floating point coordinate array ...Di2015NewLine      PointF[] solution = CPathToPointFArray(csolution, scale);Di2015NewLine      DrawMyPaths(Graphics g, solution, color); Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20609334Di2015UniqueSeparatorP
20609334Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic string GetPercentFormat(CultureInfo culture)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (culture == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        culture = CultureInfo.CurrentCulture;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    NumberFormatInfo nfi = culture.NumberFormat;Di2015NewLine    //% and . are localized by defaultDi2015NewLine    var baseFormat = "0.################";Di2015NewLine    var percentSymbol = "%";Di2015NewLine    var negativeSign = nfi.NegativeSign; //It may be problematicDi2015NewLine    string customFormat = string.Empty;Di2015NewLine    switch (nfi.PercentPositivePattern)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        case 1: //n%Di2015NewLine            customFormat += baseFormat + percentSymbol;Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine        case 2: //%nDi2015NewLine            customFormat += percentSymbol + baseFormat;Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine        case 3: //% nDi2015NewLine            customFormat += percentSymbol + " " + baseFormat;Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine        case 0: //n %Di2015NewLine        default:Di2015NewLine            customFormat += baseFormat + " " + percentSymbol;Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    customFormat += ";";Di2015NewLine    switch (nfi.PercentNegativePattern)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        case 1: //-n%Di2015NewLine            customFormat += negativeSign + baseFormat + percentSymbol;Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine        case 2: //-%nDi2015NewLine            customFormat += negativeSign + percentSymbol + baseFormat;Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine        case 3: //%-nDi2015NewLine            customFormat += percentSymbol + negativeSign + baseFormat;Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine        case 4: //%n-Di2015NewLine            customFormat += percentSymbol + baseFormat + negativeSign;Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine        case 5: //n-%Di2015NewLine            customFormat += baseFormat + negativeSign + percentSymbol;Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine        case 6: //n%-Di2015NewLine            customFormat += baseFormat + percentSymbol + negativeSign;Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine        case 7: //-% nDi2015NewLine            customFormat += negativeSign + percentSymbol + " " + baseFormat;Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine        case 8: //n %-Di2015NewLine            customFormat += baseFormat + " " + percentSymbol + negativeSign;Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine        case 9: //% n-Di2015NewLine            customFormat += percentSymbol + " " + baseFormat + negativeSign;Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine        case 10: //% -nDi2015NewLine            customFormat += percentSymbol + " " + negativeSign + baseFormat;Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine        case 11: //n- %Di2015NewLine            customFormat += baseFormat + negativeSign + " " + percentSymbol;Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine        case 0: //-n %Di2015NewLine        default:Di2015NewLine            customFormat += negativeSign + baseFormat + " " + percentSymbol;Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return customFormat;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20611312Di2015UniqueSeparatorReceive
20611312Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void Receive(IAsyncResult iar)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Socket server_conn = (Socket)iar.AsyncState;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // check how many bytes we actually receivedDi2015NewLine    var numBytesReceived = server_conn.EndReceive(iar);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (!SocketConnected(server_conn))Di2015NewLine    {   Di2015NewLine        server_conn.Close();Di2015NewLine        return;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // get the received data from the bufferDi2015NewLine    if (numBytesReceived > 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < numBytesReceived; i++)Di2015NewLine            _commQueue.Enqueue(g_bmsg[i]);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // signal the parser to continue parsing        Di2015NewLine        NotifyNewDataReceived();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // continue receivingDi2015NewLine    server_conn.BeginReceive(g_bmsg, 0, g_bmsg.Length, SocketFlags.None, new AsyncCallback(Recieve), server_conn);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20611956Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class LazyLookup<TKey, TValue> : IEnumerable<List<TValue>>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   private readonly Dictionary<TKey, List<TValue>> CachedEntries;Di2015NewLine   private readonly Func<List<TValue>> LazyListCreator;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public LazyLookup()Di2015NewLine        : this(() => new List<TValue>())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public LazyLookup(Func<List<TValue>> lazyListCreator)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.LazyListCreator = lazyListCreator;Di2015NewLine        this.CachedEntries = new Dictionary<TKey, List<TValue>>();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public List<TValue> this[TKey key]Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        getDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return GetOrCreateValue(key);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private List<TValue> GetOrCreateValue(TKey key)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        List<TValue> returnValue;Di2015NewLine        if (!CachedEntries.TryGetValue(key, out returnValue))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            returnValue = LazyListCreator();Di2015NewLine            CachedEntries[key] = returnValue;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return returnValue;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public IEnumerator<List<TValue>> GetEnumerator()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return CachedEntries.Values.GetEnumerator();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    System.Collections.IEnumerator System.Collections.IEnumerable.GetEnumerator()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return GetEnumerator();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20612503Di2015UniqueSeparator$key . $key
20612503Di2015UniqueSeparatordefine('CIPHER', 'tripledes');Di2015NewLinedefine('MODE', 'cbc');Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinefunction Encrypt($data)Di2015NewLine{ Di2015NewLine    $iv = chr(1) . chr(2) . chr(3) . chr(4) . chr(5) . chr(6) . chr(7) . chr(8);Di2015NewLine    $key = 'abcdef';Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // determine key bytes from the key text, using MD5 and wrapping aroundDi2015NewLine    $key = md5($key, true);Di2015NewLine    $key = $key . $key;Di2015NewLine    $tripleKey = substr($key, 0, mcrypt_get_key_size(CIPHER, MODE));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // add PKCS#7 paddingDi2015NewLine    $blocksize = mcrypt_get_block_size(CIPHER, MODE);Di2015NewLine    $paddingSize = $blocksize - (strlen($data) % $blocksize);Di2015NewLine    $data .= str_repeat(chr($paddingSize), $paddingSize);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    $encodedText = mcrypt_encrypt(CIPHER, $tripleKey, $data, MODE, $iv);Di2015NewLine    return base64_encode($encodedText);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinefunction Decrypt($data)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    $iv = chr(1) . chr(2) . chr(3) . chr(4) . chr(5) . chr(6) . chr(7) . chr(8);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // determine key bytes from the key text, using MD5 and wrapping aroundDi2015NewLine    $key = 'abcdef';Di2015NewLine    $key = md5($key, true);Di2015NewLine    $key = $key . $key;Di2015NewLine    $tripleKey = substr($key, 0, mcrypt_get_key_size(CIPHER, MODE));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    $decodedText = mcrypt_decrypt(CIPHER, $tripleKey, base64_decode($data), MODE, $iv);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // check and remove PKCS#7 paddingDi2015NewLine    if (!$decodedText) return $decodedText;Di2015NewLine    $lastByte = ord($decodedText[strlen($decodedText) - 1]);Di2015NewLine    if ($lastByte == 0 || $lastByte > mcrypt_get_block_size(CIPHER, MODE)) return FALSE;Di2015NewLine    $paddingText = substr($decodedText, -$lastByte, $lastByte);Di2015NewLine    $decodedText = substr($decodedText, 0, -$lastByte);Di2015NewLine    if ($paddingText != str_repeat(chr($lastByte), $lastByte)) return FALSE;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return $decodedText;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20617787Di2015UniqueSeparatortrue
20617787Di2015UniqueSeparator    private bool ContainsFlag(string contents)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int indexOfMethodDec = contents.IndexOf(_method);Di2015NewLine        int indexOfNextPublicMethod = contents.IndexOf("public", indexOfMethodDec);Di2015NewLine        if (indexOfNextPublicMethod == -1)Di2015NewLine            indexOfNextPublicMethod = int.MaxValue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int indexOfNextPrivateMethod = contents.IndexOf("private", indexOfMethodDec);Di2015NewLine        if (indexOfNextPrivateMethod == -1)Di2015NewLine            indexOfNextPrivateMethod = int.MaxValue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int indexOfNextProtectedMethod = contents.IndexOf("protected", indexOfMethodDec);Di2015NewLine        if (indexOfNextProtectedMethod == -1)Di2015NewLine            indexOfNextProtectedMethod = int.MaxValue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int[] indeces = new int[3]{indexOfNextPrivateMethod,Di2015NewLine                                   indexOfNextProtectedMethod,Di2015NewLine                                   indexOfNextPublicMethod};Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int closestToMethod = indeces.Min();Di2015NewLine        if (closestToMethod.Equals(Int32.MaxValue))Di2015NewLine            return false; //This should probably do something different.. This condition is true if the method you're reading is the last method in the class, basicallyDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine       if (closestToMethod - indexOfMethodDec < 0)Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        string methodBody = contents.Substring(indexOfMethodDec, closestToMethod - indexOfMethodDec);Di2015NewLine        if (methodBody.Contains(_flag))Di2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

20617872Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<T> Traverse<T>(IEnumerable<T> source, Di2015NewLine    Func<T, IEnumerable<T>> childSelector)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var queue = new Queue<T>(source);Di2015NewLine    while (queue.Any())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var item = queue.Dequeue();Di2015NewLine        yield return item;Di2015NewLine        foreach (var child in childSelector(item))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            queue.Enqueue(child);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20622428Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static string HashPassword(string password)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    byte[] salt;Di2015NewLine    byte[] buffer2;Di2015NewLine    if (password == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentNullException("password");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    using (Rfc2898DeriveBytes bytes = new Rfc2898DeriveBytes(password, 0x10, 0x3e8))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        salt = bytes.Salt;Di2015NewLine        buffer2 = bytes.GetBytes(0x20);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    byte[] dst = new byte[0x31];Di2015NewLine    Buffer.BlockCopy(salt, 0, dst, 1, 0x10);Di2015NewLine    Buffer.BlockCopy(buffer2, 0, dst, 0x11, 0x20);Di2015NewLine    return Convert.ToBase64String(dst);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
20622428Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static bool VerifyHashedPassword(string hashedPassword, string password)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    byte[] buffer4;Di2015NewLine    if (hashedPassword == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (password == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentNullException("password");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    byte[] src = Convert.FromBase64String(hashedPassword);Di2015NewLine    if ((src.Length != 0x31) || (src[0] != 0))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    byte[] dst = new byte[0x10];Di2015NewLine    Buffer.BlockCopy(src, 1, dst, 0, 0x10);Di2015NewLine    byte[] buffer3 = new byte[0x20];Di2015NewLine    Buffer.BlockCopy(src, 0x11, buffer3, 0, 0x20);Di2015NewLine    using (Rfc2898DeriveBytes bytes = new Rfc2898DeriveBytes(password, dst, 0x3e8))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        buffer4 = bytes.GetBytes(0x20);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return ByteArraysEqual(buffer3, buffer4);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20633585Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class Base16Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private static readonly char[] encoding;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static Base16()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        encoding = new char[16]Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            '0', '1', '2', '3', '4', '5', '6', '7',Di2015NewLine            '8', '9', 'a', 'b', 'c', 'd', 'e', 'f'Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static string Encode(byte[] data)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        char[] text = new char[data.Length * 2];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0, j = 0; i < data.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            text[j++] = encoding[data[i] >> 4];Di2015NewLine            text[j++] = encoding[data[i] & 0xf];Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return new string(text);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
20633585Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate string GenerateAppSecretProof(string accessToken, string appSecret)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    byte[] key = Base16.Decode(appSecret);Di2015NewLine    byte[] hash;Di2015NewLine    using (HMAC hmacAlg = new HMACSHA1(key))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        hash = hmacAlg.ComputeHash(Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes(accessToken));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return Base16.Encode(hash);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

      byte[] bytes = new byte[bufferSize];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            try {Di2015NewLine                Console.Write("Wait...:");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                var ip_client =            stream.Read(bytes, 0, bytes.Length);Di2015NewLine                DateTime endTime = DateTime.Now;Di2015NewLine                var package = new DataPackage(); // add your stuff in hereDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                Monitor.Enter(syncLock);Di2015NewLine                try {Di2015NewLine                    messages.Enqueue(package);Di2015NewLine                } finally {Di2015NewLine                    Monitor.Exit(syncLock);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                System.Console.Write("...received from " + ip_client + " 20636920Di2015UniqueSeparator//In your case:Di2015NewLine//start_pos = 'A' pointDi2015NewLine//end_pos = 'B' pointDi2015NewLine//time = number of seconds that elapsedDi2015NewLine//speed = number of units per secondDi2015NewLineVector2 calculatePosition(ref Vector2 start_pos, ref Vector2 end_pos, Uint32 time, Uint32 speed)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Vector2 mov_vec = Vector2.Substract(end_pos, start_pos);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Vector2 norm_mov_vec = Vector2.Normalize(mov_vec);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Vector2 delta_vec = norm_mov_vec * time * speed;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return Vector2.Add(start_pos, delta_vec);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
