20637811Di2015UniqueSeparatordynamic
20637811Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static TOutgoing Convert<TOutgoing>(object obj)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Type incomingType = obj.GetType();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    MethodInfo conversionOperator = null;Di2015NewLine    foreach(var method in incomingType.GetMethods(BindingFlags.Static | BindingFlags.Public))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (Di2015NewLine            method.Name == "op_Explicit" && //explicit converterDi2015NewLine            method.ReturnType == typeof(TOutgoing) && //returns your outgoing ("Point") typeDi2015NewLine            method.GetParameters().Length == 1 && //only has 1 input parameterDi2015NewLine            method.GetParameters()[0].ParameterType == incomingType //parameter type matches your incoming ("float2D") typeDi2015NewLine            )Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            conversionOperator = method;Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (conversionOperator != null)Di2015NewLine        return (TOutgoing)conversionOperator.Invoke(null, new object[]{obj});Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    throw new Exception("No conversion operator found");Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
20637811Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static TOutgoing Convert<TOutgoing>(object obj)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Type incomingType = obj.GetType();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var conversionOperator = incomingType.GetMethods(BindingFlags.Static | BindingFlags.Public)Di2015NewLine        .Where(m => m.Name == "op_Explicit")Di2015NewLine        .Where(m => m.ReturnType == typeof(TOutgoing))Di2015NewLine        .Where(m => m.GetParameters().Length == 1 && m.GetParameters()[0].ParameterType == incomingType)Di2015NewLine        .FirstOrDefault();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (conversionOperator != null)Di2015NewLine        return (TOutgoing)conversionOperator.Invoke(null, new object[]{obj});Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    throw new Exception("No conversion operator found");Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20637811Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class ConversionUtilityDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private static Dictionary<Type, Dictionary<Type, IConverter>> Converters = new Dictionary<Type, Dictionary<Type, IConverter>>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void RegisterConversion<TIncoming, TOutgoing>(Func<TIncoming, TOutgoing> conversionFunction)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!Converters.ContainsKey(typeof(TIncoming)))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Converters[typeof(TIncoming)] = new Dictionary<Type, IConverter>();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Converters[typeof(TIncoming)].Add(typeof(TOutgoing), new Converter<TIncoming, TOutgoing>(conversionFunction));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static TOutgoing Convert<TOutgoing>(object obj)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Type incomingType = obj.GetType();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        IConverter converter = Converters[incomingType][typeof(TOutgoing)];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return (TOutgoing)converter.Convert(obj);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20638309Di2015UniqueSeparatorAppDomain.CurrentDomain.AssemblyResolve += CurrentDomainAssemblyResolve;

20638427Di2015UniqueSeparatorList<PrimaryKeyModel> keys = new List<PrimaryKeyModel>()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine        new PrimaryKeyModel("Id", "3", 1),Di2015NewLine        new PrimaryKeyModel("Id2", "1", 1),Di2015NewLine        new PrimaryKeyModel("Id", "1", 2),Di2015NewLine        new PrimaryKeyModel("Id2", "1", 2),Di2015NewLine        new PrimaryKeyModel("Id", "3", 3),Di2015NewLine        new PrimaryKeyModel("Id2", "1", 3),Di2015NewLine};Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevar groupedKeys = keys.OrderBy(pk => pk.ColumnName).GroupBy(k => k.RowNumber).ToList();Di2015NewLineHashSet<int> duplicateRowNumbers = new HashSet<int>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinefor (int i = 0; i < groupedKeys.Count - 1; i++)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    for (int j = i + 1; j < groupedKeys.Count; j++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (AreTheSame(groupedKeys[i], groupedKeys[j]))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            duplicateRowNumbers.Add(groupedKeys[i].First().RowNumber);Di2015NewLine            duplicateRowNumbers.Add(groupedKeys[j].First().RowNumber);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static bool AreTheSame(IEnumerable<PrimaryKeyModel> a, IEnumerable<PrimaryKeyModel> b)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var leftEnumerator = a.GetEnumerator();Di2015NewLine    var rightEnumerator = b.GetEnumerator();Di2015NewLine    while (leftEnumerator.MoveNext() | rightEnumerator.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (leftEnumerator.Current == null) return false;Di2015NewLine        if (rightEnumerator.Current == null) return false;Di2015NewLine        if (leftEnumerator.Current.ColumnValue != rightEnumerator.Current.ColumnValue) return false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return true;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20639723Di2015UniqueSeparator    /// <summary>Creates a new Task that mirrors the supplied task but that Di2015NewLine    /// will be canceled after the specified timeout.</summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <typeparam name="TResult">Specifies the type of data contained in the Di2015NewLine    /// task.</typeparam>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="task">The task.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="timeout">The timeout.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>The new Task that may time out.</returns>Di2015NewLine    public static Task<TResult> WithTimeout<TResult>(this Task<TResult> task, Di2015NewLine                                                          TimeSpan timeout)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var result = new TaskCompletionSource<TResult>(task.AsyncState);Di2015NewLine        var timer = new Timer(state => Di2015NewLine                        ((TaskCompletionSource<TResult>)state).TrySetCanceled(),Di2015NewLine                        result, timeout, TimeSpan.FromMilliseconds(-1));Di2015NewLine        task.ContinueWith(t =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            timer.Dispose();Di2015NewLine            result.TrySetFromTask(t);Di2015NewLine        }, TaskContinuationOptions.ExecuteSynchronously);Di2015NewLine        return result.Task;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

               Di2015NewLine  lastSelectedIndex = listBox1.SelectedIndex;Di2015NewLine  SetItemHeight(lastSelectedIndex, selectedItemHeight);Di2015NewLine  var rect1 = listBox1.GetItemRectangle(minIndex);Di2015NewLine  var rect2 = listBox1.GetItemRectangle(maxIndex);Di2015NewLine  listBox1.Invalidate(new Rectangle(rect1.X, rect1.Y, Di2015NewLine                                    rect1.Width, rect2.Bottom - rect1.Top)); Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20641676Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static double StdDev(IEnumerable<double> seq)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    long count = 0;Di2015NewLine    double sum = 0;Di2015NewLine    double sumOfSquares = 0;Di2015NewLine    foreach(var value in seq)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        sum += value;Di2015NewLine        sumOfSquares += value * value;Di2015NewLine        count++;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    double average = sum / count;Di2015NewLine    double averageSquare = sumOfSquares / count;Di2015NewLine    return Math.Sqrt(averageSquare - average * average);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20641917Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class Leveled<T> Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public T Item {get; set;}Di2015NewLine    public int Level {get; set;}Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static IEnumerable<Leveled<T>> ToLeveled<T>(this IEnumerable<T> sequence,Di2015NewLine                                            int level)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   return sequence.Select(item => new Leveled<T>{ Item = item, Level = level});Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static IEnumerable<Leveled<T>> FlattenLeveled<T>(this IEnumerable<T> sequence, Di2015NewLine                                            Func<T, IEnumerable<T>> childFetcher)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var itemsToYield = new Queue<Leveled<T>>(sequence.ToLeveled(0));Di2015NewLine    while (itemsToYield.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var leveledItem = itemsToYield.Dequeue();Di2015NewLine        yield return leveledItem;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var children = childFetcher(leveledItem.Item).ToLeveled(leveledItem.Level + 1);Di2015NewLine        if (children != null)Di2015NewLine        { Di2015NewLine            foreach (var child in children) Di2015NewLine               itemsToYield.Enqueue(child);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
20641917Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar thirdLevel = myCollectionDi2015NewLine           .FlattenLeveled(item => item.Children)Di2015NewLine           .Where(leveledItem => leveledItem.Level == 2)Di2015NewLine           .Select(leveledItem => leveledItem.Item)Di2015NewLine

20646920Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void UploadImage(byte[] content)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string boundary = Guid.NewGuid().ToString();Di2015NewLine    string header = string.Format("--{0}", boundary);Di2015NewLine    string footer = string.Format("--{0}--", boundary);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    HttpWebRequest request = (HttpWebRequest)WebRequest.Create("https://api.imgur.com/3/upload");Di2015NewLine    request.Method = "POST";Di2015NewLine    request.Headers["Authorization"] = "Client-ID " + clientID;Di2015NewLine    request.ContentType = "multipart/form-data, boundary=" + boundary;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    StringBuilder builder = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine    string base64string = Convert.ToBase64String(content);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    builder.AppendLine(header);Di2015NewLine    builder.AppendLine("Content-Disposition: form-data; name=\\"image\\"");Di2015NewLine    builder.AppendLine();Di2015NewLine    builder.AppendLine(base64string);Di2015NewLine    builder.AppendLine(footer);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    byte[] data = Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(builder.ToString());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    using (Stream s = request.GetRequestStream())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        s.Write(data, 0, data.Length);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        HttpWebResponse response = (HttpWebResponse)request.GetResponse();Di2015NewLine        using (StreamReader reader = new StreamReader(response.GetResponseStream()))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var imageURL = reader.ReadToEnd();Di2015NewLine            Regex regex = new Regex(@"https?://([-\\w\\.]+)+(:\\d+)?(/([-\\w/_\\.]*(\\?\\S+)?)?)?");Di2015NewLine            MatchCollection matches = regex.Matches(imageURL);Di2015NewLine            foreach (Match match in matches)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                finalImageURL = match.Value;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catch (WebException ex)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        using (StreamReader reader = new StreamReader(ex.Response.GetResponseStream()))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            imageURL = "An uploading error occured. Please check your connection.";Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

image";Di2015NewLine           await DecodeStaticResource();Di2015NewLine           return;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        MediaCaptureInitializationSettings settings;Di2015NewLine }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine           settings = new MediaCaptureInitializationSettings { VideoDeviceId = cameras[1].Id }; // 0 => front, 1 => backDi2015NewLine _mediaCapture.StartPreviewAsync();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        while (_result == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine           var photoStorageFile = await _mediaCapture.CapturePhotoToStorageFileAsync(ImageEncodingProperties.CreateJpeg(), photoStorageFile);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine           var stream = await photoStorageFile.OpenReadAsync();Di2015NewLine           // initialize with 1,1 to get the current size of the imageDi2015NewLine           var writeableBmp = new WriteableBitmap(1, 1);Di2015NewLine           writeableBmp.SetSource(stream);Di2015NewLine           // and create it again because otherwise the WB isn't fully initialized and decodingDi2015NewLine           // results in a photoStorageFile.DeleteAsync(StorageDeleteOption.PermanentDelete);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        await _mediaCapture.StopPreviewAsync();Di2015NewLine        VideoCapture.Visibility = Visibility.Collapsed;Di2015NewLine        CaptureImage.Visibility = Visibility.Visible;Di2015NewLine        ScanResult.Text = _result.Text;Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLine     catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine     {Di2015NewLine        Error.Text = ex.Message;Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  private async System.Threading.Tasks.Task DecodeStaticResource()Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine     var file = await Windows.ApplicationModel.Package.Current.InstalledLocation.GetFileAsync(@"Assets\\1.jpg");Di2015NewLine     var stream = await file.OpenReadAsync();Di2015NewLine     // initialize with 1,1 to get the current size of the imageDi2015NewLine     var writeableBmp = new WriteableBitmap(1, 1);Di2015NewLine     writeableBmp.SetSource(stream);Di2015NewLine     // and create it again because otherwise the WB isn't fully initialized and decodingDi2015NewLine     // results in a IndexOutOfRangeDi2015NewLine     writeableBmp = new WriteableBitmap(writeableBmp.PixelWidth, writeableBmp.PixelHeight);Di2015NewLine     stream.Seek(0);Di2015NewLine     writeableBmp.SetSource(stream);Di2015NewLine 20657423Di2015UniqueSeparator    private long TestIndexOf(string haystack, char[] needles)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch sw = new System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch();Di2015NewLine        sw.Start();Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < 1000000; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Match m = regex.Match(haystack);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        sw.Stop();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return sw.ElapsedMilliseconds;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private long TestIndexOf(string haystack, char[] needles)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch sw = new System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch();Di2015NewLine        sw.Start();Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < 1000000; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int x = haystack.IndexOf(needles[0]);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        sw.Stop();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return sw.ElapsedMilliseconds;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private long TestHashset(string haystack, char[] needles)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        HashSet<char> specificChars = new HashSet<char>(needles.ToList());Di2015NewLine        System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch sw = new System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch();Di2015NewLine        sw.Start();Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < 1000000; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            bool notContainsSpecificChars = !haystack.Any(specificChars.Contains);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        sw.Stop();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return sw.ElapsedMilliseconds;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

20659020Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static async Task<string> MergeRecursive(IEnumerable<string> strings)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (strings.Count() == 1)Di2015NewLine        return strings.First();Di2015NewLine    // Here we make a real mergingDi2015NewLine    if (strings.Count() == 2)Di2015NewLine        return Merge(strings.First(), strings.Last());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var parts = strings.Select((s, i) => new { s, i })Di2015NewLine                       .GroupBy(g => g.i % 2, g => g.s, (k, v) => v)Di2015NewLine                       .ToList();Di2015NewLine    var results = await Task.WhenAll(parts.Select(p => Task.Run(() => MergeRecursive(p))));Di2015NewLine    return await MergeRecursive(results);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20660183Di2015UniqueSeparatorIMyMessageListeners
20660183Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic interface IMyMessageListenersDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    void Add(IMyMessageReceiver receiver);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // I added this since I think this is how you're going to use itDi2015NewLine    void Send(IMyMessage message);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
20660183Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class MyMessageListeners : IMyMessageListenersDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    readonly List<IMyMessageReceiver> _list = new List<IMyMessageReceiver>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Add(IMyMessageReceiver receiver)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _list.Add(receiver);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Send(IMyMessage message)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foreach (var listener in _list)Di2015NewLine            listener.HandleMessage(message);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
20660183Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class MyMessagePublisherDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static readonly Dictionary<Type, IMyMessageListeners> _subscribers = new Dictionary<Type, IMyMessageListeners>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // I added this too, since I think this is how you intend to use itDi2015NewLine    public static void Publish<T>(T message) where T : IMyMessageDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Type messageType = typeof(T);Di2015NewLine        IMyMessageListeners listeners;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (_subscribers.TryGetValue(messageType, out listeners))Di2015NewLine            listeners.Send(message);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void Subscribe<T>(IMyMessageReceiver<T> receiver) where T : IMyMessageDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Type messageType = typeof(T);Di2015NewLine        IMyMessageListeners listeners;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (!_subscribers.TryGetValue(messageType, out listeners))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // no list found, so create itDi2015NewLine            listeners = new MyMessageListeners();Di2015NewLine            _subscribers.Add(messageType, listeners);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        listeners.Add(receiver);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20661602Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static List<SomeClass> ExtractSeries(string JSONDs, string seedA,string seedB,string groupby)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var jss = new JavaScriptSerializer();Di2015NewLine    return (from item in jss.Deserialize<List<Dictionary<string, object>>>(JSONDs)Di2015NewLine            select new { val = new Dictionary<string, object>(){{ seedA, item[seedA]}, {seedB, item[seedB] }}, groupKey = item[groupby] } into sampleObjDi2015NewLine            group sampleObj by sampleObj.groupKey into gDi2015NewLine            select new SomeClass{ Name = g.Key, Data = g.Select(i=>i.val).ToList() })Di2015NewLine           .ToList();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20662188Di2015UniqueSeparatorRouteBase
20662188Di2015UniqueSeparatorRoute
20662188Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class SeoFriendlyRoute : RouteDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly string[] _valuesToSeo;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public SeoFriendlyRoute(string url, RouteValueDictionary defaults, IEnumerable<string> valuesToSeo, RouteValueDictionary constraints = null, RouteValueDictionary dataTokens = null, IRouteHandler routeHandler = null)Di2015NewLine        : base(url, defaults, constraints ?? new RouteValueDictionary(), dataTokens ?? new RouteValueDictionary(), routeHandler ?? new MvcRouteHandler())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (valuesToSeo == null) { throw new ArgumentNullException("valuesToSeo"); }Di2015NewLine        _valuesToSeo = valuesToSeo.ToArray();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public override RouteData GetRouteData(HttpContextBase httpContext)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var routeData = base.GetRouteData(httpContext);Di2015NewLine        if (routeData != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            foreach (var key in _valuesToSeo)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (routeData.Values.ContainsKey(key))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    routeData.Values[key] = GetActualValue((string)routeData.Values[key]);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return routeData;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public override VirtualPathData GetVirtualPath(RequestContext requestContext, RouteValueDictionary values)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var seoFriendyValues = new RouteValueDictionary(values);Di2015NewLine        foreach (var key in _valuesToSeo)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (seoFriendyValues.ContainsKey(key))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                seoFriendyValues[key] = GetSeoFriendlyValue((string)seoFriendyValues[key]);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return base.GetVirtualPath(requestContext, seoFriendyValues);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private string GetSeoFriendlyValue(string actualValue)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //your methodDi2015NewLine        StringBuilder str = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0, len = actualValue.Length; i < len; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (i == 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                str.Append(Char.ToLower(actualValue[i]));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else if (Char.IsUpper(actualValue[i]))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                str.Append("-" + Char.ToLower(actualValue[i]));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                str.Append(actualValue[i]);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return str.ToString();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static string GetActualValue(string seoFriendlyValue)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //action name is not case sensitiveDi2015NewLine        //one limitation is the dash can be anywhere but the action will still be resolvedDi2015NewLine        // /my-jumbled-page-name is same as /myjumbled-pagenameDi2015NewLine        return seoFriendlyValue.Replace("-", string.Empty); Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

DefaultTestDirectoryName; }Di2015NewLine        set { testDirectoryName = value; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    private static string testDirectoryName;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static string MasterFilesFolderName {Di2015NewLine        get { return masterFilesFolderName ?? DefaultMasterFilesFolderName; }Di2015NewLine        set { masterFilesFolderName = value; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    private static string masterFilesFolderName;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static string TestFileExtension { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static string BuildTestFileName(string fileName) {Di2015NewLine        if (String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(Path.GetPathRoot(fileName)))Di2015NewLine            fileName = Path.Combine(TestDirectoryName, fileName);Di2015NewLine        if (String.IsNullOrEmpty(Path.GetExtension(fileName)))Di2015NewLine            fileName = Path.ChangeExtension(fileName, TestFileExtension);Di2015NewLine        return fileName;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static string BuildTestMasterFileName(string fileName) {Di2015NewLine        if (Path.IsPathRooted(fileName))Di2015NewLine            return Path.Combine(Path.Combine(Path.GetDirectoryName(fileName), MasterFilesFolderName), Path.GetFileName(fileName));Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            return Path.Combine(Path.Combine(TestDirectoryName, MasterFilesFolderName), fileName);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static string UseTestMasterFile(string fileName) {Di2015NewLine        string dest = BuildTestFileName(fileName);Di2015NewLine        string source = BuildTestMasterFileName(dest);Di2015NewLine        DeleteTestFile(dest);Di2015NewLine        ClearReadOnlyAttributes(source);Di2015NewLine        File.Copy(source, dest, true);Di2015NewLine        return dest;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void DeleteTestFile(string filePath) {Di2015NewLine        if (String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(filePath)) { return; }Di2015NewLine        if (!File.Exists(filePath)) { return; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        ClearReadOnlyAttributes(filePath);Di2015NewLine        File.Delete(filePath);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void ClearReadOnlyAttributes(string filePath) {Di2015NewLine        if (String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(filePath)) { return; }Di2015NewLine        if (!File.Exists(filePath)) { return; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        FileAttributes attributes = File.GetAttributes(filePath);Di2015NewLine        if ((attributes & FileAttributes.ReadOnly) == FileAttributes.ReadOnly)Di2015NewLine            File.SetAttributes(filePath, attributes ^ FileAttributes.ReadOnly);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public static void SetReadOnlyAttributes(string filePath) {Di2015NewLine        if (String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(filePath)) { return; }Di2015NewLine        if (!File.Exists(filePath)) { return; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        FileAttributes attributes = File.GetAttributes(filePath);Di2015NewLine        if ((attributes & FileAttributes.ReadOnly) == FileAttributes.ReadOnly)Di2015NewLine            File.SetAttributes(filePath, attributes | FileAttributes.ReadOnly);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20667927Di2015UniqueSeparatorList<Point>.Contains(Point p)
20667927Di2015UniqueSeparatorPoint target = new Point(...)
20667927Di2015UniqueSeparatorList<Point> checkd = new List<Point>();Di2015NewLineList<Point> queue = new List<Point>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinequeue.Add(new Point(startX, startY));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinewhile (queue.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Point origin = queue[0];Di2015NewLine    queue.RemoveAt(0);Di2015NewLine    sector.Add(origin);Di2015NewLine    checkd.Add(origin);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (int offsetX = -1; offsetX < 2; offsetX++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for (int offsetY = -1; offsetY < 2; offsetY++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // do not check origin or diagonal neighboursDi2015NewLine            if (offsetX == 0 && offsetY == 0 || offsetX == offsetY || offsetX == -offsetY || -offsetX == offsetY) continue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Point target = new Point(origin.X + offsetX, origin.Y + offsetY);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // skip out of bounds pointDi2015NewLine            if (target.X < 0 || target.Y < 0 || target.X >= cells.Width || target.Y >= cells.Height) continue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (!Contains(checkd, target) && !Contains(queue, target))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                queue.Add(target);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20669055Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static byte[] MD5Hash( byte[] salt, Stream s , int blockSize )Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  MD5CryptoServiceProvider md5 = new MD5CryptoServiceProvider() ;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  md5.Initialize();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  md5.TransformBlock(salt,0,salt.Length,salt,0) ;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  byte[] buf  = new byte[blockSize];Di2015NewLine  int    bufl ;Di2015NewLine  while ( (bufl=s.Read( buf , 0 , buf.Length )) > 0 )Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    md5.TransformBlock(buf,0,bufl,buf,0) ;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  md5.TransformFinalBlock(buf,0,0) ;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  return md5.Hash ;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20671731Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void LabelDisplayCondensed(FactorTreeNode root)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string result = Convert.ToString(root.Key) + " =";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    long prevFactor = 0;Di2015NewLine    int exponent = 0;Di2015NewLine    bool firstFactor = true;Di2015NewLine    FactorTreeNode currentNode = root;Di2015NewLine    while (currentNode != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        long nextFactor = currentNode.Left == null ?Di2015NewLine            currentNode.Key :Di2015NewLine            currentNode.Left.Key;Di2015NewLine        if (nextFactor != prevFactor && prevFactor != 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            result += WriteFactor(prevFactor, exponent, ref firstFactor);Di2015NewLine            exponent = 1;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            exponent++;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        prevFactor = nextFactor;Di2015NewLine        currentNode = currentNode.Right;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    result += WriteFactor(prevFactor, exponent, ref firstFactor);Di2015NewLine    MessageBox.Show(result);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate string WriteFactor(long factor, int exponent, ref bool firstFactor)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string result = firstFactor ? " " : " X ";Di2015NewLine    firstFactor = false;Di2015NewLine    if (exponent == 1)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        result += factor.ToString();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        result += factor.ToString() + " ^ " + exponent.ToString();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20672957Di2015UniqueSeparator    CREATE FUNCTION [dbo].[udf_NthIndex] Di2015NewLine                   (@Input     VARCHAR(8000), Di2015NewLine                    @Delimiter CHAR(1), Di2015NewLine                    @Ordinal   INT) Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    RETURNS INT Di2015NewLine    AS Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      BEGIN Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        DECLARE  @Pointer INT, Di2015NewLine                 @Last    INT, Di2015NewLine                 @Count   INT Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        SET @Pointer = 1 Di2015NewLine        SET @Last = 0 Di2015NewLine        SET @Count = 1 Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        WHILE (2 > 1) Di2015NewLine          BEGIN Di2015NewLine            SET @Pointer = CHARINDEX(@Delimiter,@Input,@Pointer) Di2015NewLine            IF @Pointer = 0 Di2015NewLine              BREAK Di2015NewLine            IF @Count = @Ordinal Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine              BEGIN Di2015NewLine                SET @Last = @Pointer Di2015NewLine                BREAK Di2015NewLine              END Di2015NewLine            SET @Count = @Count + 1 Di2015NewLine            SET @Pointer = @Pointer + 1 Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine          END Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        RETURN @Last Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      ENDDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    GODi2015NewLine;Di2015NewLine

20681554Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void directoryPacker(DirectoryInfo directoryInfo)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // The list of all subdirectory relatively to the rootDirectory, that should get zipped tooDi2015NewLine    var subPathsToInclude = new List<string>() { "subdir1", "subdir2", @"subdir2\\subsubdir" };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    string pathToRootDirectory = Path.Combine(directoryInfo.Parent.FullName,Di2015NewLine                                directoryInfo.Name) + ".abc"; //name of root fileDi2015NewLine    using (ZipContainer zip = new ZipContainer(pass))Di2015NewLine    //ZipContainer inherits from Ionic.Zip.ZipFileDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Add contents of root directoryDi2015NewLine        addDirectoryContentToZip(zip, "/", directoryInfo.FullName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Add all subdirectories that are inside the list "subPathsToInclude"Di2015NewLine        foreach (var subPathToInclude in subPathsToInclude)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var directoryPath = Path.Combine(new[] { directoryInfo.FullName, subPathToInclude });Di2015NewLine            if (Directory.Exists(directoryPath))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                addDirectoryContentToZip(zip, subPathToInclude.Replace("\\\\", "/"), directoryPath);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (File.Exists(pathToRootDirectory))Di2015NewLine            File.Delete(pathToRootDirectory);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        zip.Save(pathToRootDirecotry); //save in rootname.bddDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void addDirectoryContentToZip(ZipContainer zip, string zipPath, DirectoryInfo directoryPath)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    zip.AddDirectoryByName(zipPath);Di2015NewLine    foreach (var file in directoryPath.GetFiles())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        zip.AddFile(file, zipPath + "/" + Path.GetFileName(file.FullName));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20683602Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class UnityModelValidator : DataAnnotationsModelValidatorDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly IUnityContainer unityContainer;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public UnityModelValidator(ModelMetadata metadata, Di2015NewLine        ControllerContext context, Di2015NewLine        ValidationAttribute attribute,Di2015NewLine        IUnityContainer unityContainer)Di2015NewLine        : base(metadata, context, attribute)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.unityContainer = unityContainer;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override IEnumerable<ModelValidationResult> Validate(object container)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            unityContainer.BuildUp(Attribute.GetType(), Attribute);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (ResolutionFailedException ex)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //Don't understand why it sometimes tries to use Unity to create an attribute rather than just build up an existing object. If this happens it can fail but we want to ignore it.Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        ValidationContext context = CreateValidationContext(container);Di2015NewLine        ValidationResult result = Attribute.GetValidationResult(Metadata.Model, context);Di2015NewLine        if (result != ValidationResult.Success)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            yield return new ModelValidationResultDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Message = result.ErrorMessageDi2015NewLine            };Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected virtual ValidationContext CreateValidationContext(object container)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var context = new ValidationContext(container ?? Metadata.Model, new UnityServiceLocator(unityContainer), null);Di2015NewLine        context.DisplayName = Metadata.GetDisplayName();Di2015NewLine        return context;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20683602Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class InitialsMustBeAvailableAttribute : ValidationAttributeDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    [Dependency]Di2015NewLine    public IUserService UserService { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override bool IsValid(object value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return UserService.AreInitialsAvailable((string)value);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override ValidationResult IsValid(object value, ValidationContext validationContext)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var userService = (IUserService)validationContext.GetService(typeof(IUserService));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (userService != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (userService.AreInitialsAvailable((string) value))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return null;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return new ValidationResult("Initals must be unique!");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
